description: High-performance gaming mouse with HERO 25K sensor, 11 programmable buttons, and customizable weights. Ergonomic design ideal for medium to large hands with textured rubber grips.
Wireless gaming mouse with 15 programmable controls and dual connectivity. Features a larger frame specifically designed for palm grip and larger hands. Extended battery life of up to 240 hours.
Ultra-lightweight ergonomic gaming mouse with Razer's Focus Pro 30K optical sensor. Compact design best suited for small to medium hands. 90-hour battery life with HyperSpeed wireless.
Gaming laptop with AMD Ryzen 9 processor, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and 15.6" FHD 144Hz display. Features RGB keyboard and advanced cooling system.
Ultra-thin gaming laptop with Intel Core i7, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti, 16GB RAM, 512GB NVMe SSD, and 15.6" FHD 144Hz display. Weighs only 3.7 lbs with Wi-Fi 6E support.
High-performance gaming laptop with AMD Ryzen 9 6900HX, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 Ti, 32GB DDR5 RAM, 1TB SSD, and 17.3" QHD 240Hz display. Features Alienware's Cryo-Tech cooling.
5G smartphone with 6.2" Dynamic AMOLED display, Exynos 2100 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, 4000mAh battery, and triple rear camera system (12MP+12MP+64MP). Features 8K video recording.

5G smartphone with 6.1" Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor, 8GB RAM, 128GB storage, 3700mAh battery with 45W fast charging. Enhanced camera system with improved night mode and 3x optical zoom.

Premium smartphone with 6.1" Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion, A16 Bionic chip, 6GB RAM, 256GB storage, and triple camera system (48MP+12MP+12MP). Features Dynamic Island interface and Always-On display.
Android smartphone with 6.7" LTPO AMOLED display, Google Tensor G2 chip, 12GB RAM, 128GB storage, and triple camera system with 5x optical zoom. Features best-in-class computational photography.
Premium mechanical gaming keyboard with CORSAIR OPX optical-mechanical switches, per-key RGB backlighting, 6 dedicated macro keys, and aluminum frame. Includes palm rest and multimedia controls.
Low-profile wireless mechanical gaming keyboard with tactile switches, RGB lighting, and aircraft-grade aluminum alloy frame. Tenkeyless design saves space without sacrificing performance.
Mechanical gaming keyboard with Razer Green switches, doubleshot ABS keycaps, and Chroma RGB lighting. Features digital dial and media keys with plush leatherette wrist rest.
Full HD 1080p webcam with dual microphones, automatic light correction, and 78Â° field of view. Perfect for streaming, video conferencing, and content creation.
USB camera with uncompressed 1080p 60FPS, adaptive light sensor, HDR-enabled, and wide-angle lens with adjustable FOV. Optimized for streaming and professional video calls.
Premium webcam with Sony STARVIS CMOS sensor, f/2.4 24mm all-glass lens, and uncompressed 1080p60 video. Includes Camera Hub software for professional-level customization.
High fidelity gaming headset with premium speaker drivers, ClearCast bidirectional microphone, and lightweight aluminum alloy and steel construction. Features DTS Headphone:X v2.0 surround sound.
Gaming headset with dual chamber drivers, detachable noise-cancellation microphone, and memory foam ear cushions. Durable aluminum frame with expanded headband for long-lasting comfort.
32-inch QLED gaming monitor with 1000R curved screen, 240Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and WQHD resolution. Features G-Sync compatibility and HDR600 support.
27-inch Nano IPS gaming monitor with 4K UHD resolution, 144Hz refresh rate (160Hz OC), 1ms response time, HDMI 2.1, and G-Sync compatibility. Features HDR600 with 98% DCI-P3 color gamut.
